title: AI Growth Engineer
location: San Francisco Bay Area or New York City
description:
The Opportunity
AI is rapidly transforming the world. Whether it’s developing the next generation of human-level intelligence, multi-agent systems, human quality voice assistants, or enabling researchers to analyze genetic markers at scale, AI is increasingly integrated into various aspects of our daily lives.Arize is the leading AI observability and Evaluation platform to help AI teams discover issues, diagnose problems, and improve the results of their AI Applications. In short: we are here to build world class software that helps make AI applications work better.
The Role
The DNA of the Arize brand is one of learning, education and analysis. The Dev growth role is one where AI meets social media and community. The overall role of Dev growth is to engage the AI community through AI content on a daily basis. These include leading the charge as an Arize AI influencer in the AI community and helping build content on a daily basis for the Arize team pushes out into that community. You will be tasked with short research projects that might include writing code, testing models and or reading/distilling AI papers, that then are fed into the AI community. 
What You’ll Do

Create visibility of Arize and Phoenix content through thought-provoking daily technical content that is pushed out through AI community whether twitter, linkedin and reddit
Build connections to Arize and Phoenix through viewership and consumption of AI related materials 
Build research, content and video snippets that resonate in the AI community and are related to Arize in areas of Evaluation, AI Assistants, AI Agents and AI Applications.
Write code, build AI applications and write cookbooks that demonstrate the Arize product lines or other ecosystem tools that can be spread in the AI community
Write the book on AI social marketing on how to turn consumption of AI content into OSS product usage & awareness  

What We’re Looking For

3+ years experience working as a Developer Advocate, Data Scientist, AI/ML Engineer, Solutions Engineer, or technical Product Manager/Marketer 
Working knowledge of generative AI, machine learning, and data science
Technical experience with the LLM app development stack (e.g. agents, orchestration frameworks, vector databases, evaluation libraries) with proficiency in Python
Engaged in technical communities via GitHub, Medium, DZone, Stack Overflow, Reddit, LinkedIn, etc.
A data-driven creative who thrives in ideating and delivering on novel activities that earn the attention and trust of AI/ML practitioners
A self-learner who isn’t daunted by technical complexity and welcomes the challenge to develop their own POV
Excellent written and verbal communication
Willingness to attend evening meetups and events in the SF Bay Area

The estimated annual salary for this role is between $100,000 - $175,000, plus a competitive equity package. Actual compensation is determined based upon a variety of job related factors that may include: transferable work experience, skill sets, and qualifications. Total compensation also includes a comprehensive benefit package, including: medical, dental, vision, 401(k) plan, unlimited paid time off, generous parental leave plan, and others for mental and wellness support.
While we are a remote-first company, we have opened offices in New York City and the San Francisco Bay Area, as an option for those in those cities who wish to work in-person. For all other employees, there is a WFH monthly stipend to pay for co-working spaces.
 More About Arize
Arize’s mission is to make the world’s AI work and work for the people. Our founders came together through a common frustration: investments in AI are growing rapidly across businesses and organizations of all types, yet it is incredibly difficult to understand why a machine learning model behaves the way it does after it is deployed into the real world.
Learn more about Arize in an interview with our founders: https://www.forbes.com/sites/frederickdaso/2020/09/01/arize-ai-helps-us-understand-how-ai-works/#322488d7753c
 
Diversity & Inclusion @ Arize
Our company's mission is to make AI work and make AI work for the people, we hope to make an impact in bias industry-wide and that's a big motivator for people who work here. We actively hope that individuals contribute to a good culture

Regularly have chats with industry experts, researchers, and ethicists across the ecosystem to advance the use of responsible AI
Culturally conscious events such as LGBTQ trivia during pride month
We have an active Lady Arizers subgroup

The Opportunity

AI is rapidly transforming the world. Whether it’s developing the next generation of human-level intelligence, multi-agent systems, human quality voice assistants, or enabling researchers to analyze genetic markers at scale, AI is increasingly integrated into various aspects of our daily lives.

Arize is the leading AI observability and Evaluation platform to help AI teams discover issues, diagnose problems, and improve the results of their AI Applications. In short: we are here to build world class software that helps make AI applications work better.

The Role

The DNA of the Arize brand is one of learning, education and analysis. The Dev growth role is one where AI meets social media and community. The overall role of Dev growth is to engage the AI community through AI content on a daily basis. These include leading the charge as an Arize AI influencer in the AI community and helping build content on a daily basis for the Arize team pushes out into that community. You will be tasked with short research projects that might include writing code, testing models and or reading/distilling AI papers, that then are fed into the AI community. 

What You’ll Do

  • Create visibility of Arize and Phoenix content through thought-provoking daily technical content that is pushed out through AI community whether twitter, linkedin and reddit
  • Build connections to Arize and Phoenix through viewership and consumption of AI related materials 
  • Build research, content and video snippets that resonate in the AI community and are related to Arize in areas of Evaluation, AI Assistants, AI Agents and AI Applications.
  • Write code, build AI applications and write cookbooks that demonstrate the Arize product lines or other ecosystem tools that can be spread in the AI community
  • Write the book on AI social marketing on how to turn consumption of AI content into OSS product usage & awareness  

What We’re Looking For

  • 3+ years experience working as a Developer Advocate, Data Scientist, AI/ML Engineer, Solutions Engineer, or technical Product Manager/Marketer 
  • Working knowledge of generative AI, machine learning, and data science
  • Technical experience with the LLM app development stack (e.g. agents, orchestration frameworks, vector databases, evaluation libraries) with proficiency in Python
  • Engaged in technical communities via GitHub, Medium, DZone, Stack Overflow, Reddit, LinkedIn, etc.
  • A data-driven creative who thrives in ideating and delivering on novel activities that earn the attention and trust of AI/ML practitioners
  • A self-learner who isn’t daunted by technical complexity and welcomes the challenge to develop their own POV
  • Excellent written and verbal communication
  • Willingness to attend evening meetups and events in the SF Bay Area

The estimated annual salary for this role is between $100,000 - $175,000, plus a competitive equity package. Actual compensation is determined based upon a variety of job related factors that may include: transferable work experience, skill sets, and qualifications. Total compensation also includes a comprehensive benefit package, including: medical, dental, vision, 401(k) plan, unlimited paid time off, generous parental leave plan, and others for mental and wellness support.

While we are a remote-first company, we have opened offices in New York City and the San Francisco Bay Area, as an option for those in those cities who wish to work in-person. For all other employees, there is a WFH monthly stipend to pay for co-working spaces.

 

More About Arize

Arize’s mission is to make the world’s AI work and work for the people. Our founders came together through a common frustration: investments in AI are growing rapidly across businesses and organizations of all types, yet it is incredibly difficult to understand why a machine learning model behaves the way it does after it is deployed into the real world.

Learn more about Arize in an interview with our founders: https://www.forbes.com/sites/frederickdaso/2020/09/01/arize-ai-helps-us-understand-how-ai-works/#322488d7753c

 

Diversity & Inclusion @ Arize

Our company's mission is to make AI work and make AI work for the people, we hope to make an impact in bias industry-wide and that's a big motivator for people who work here. We actively hope that individuals contribute to a good culture

  • Regularly have chats with industry experts, researchers, and ethicists across the ecosystem to advance the use of responsible AI
  • Culturally conscious events such as LGBTQ trivia during pride month
  • We have an active Lady Arizers subgroup
